required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on February 08, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Neurocognitive Functions of Recovered COVID-19 Patients
clinical_study.official_title: An Investigation of Neurocognitive Functions and the Influencing Factors in Recovered Patients With COVID-19

lead_sponsor.agency: National Institute on Drug Dependence, China

clinical_study.source: National Institute on Drug Dependence, China

brief_summary.textblock: This study is carried on in Wuchang Hospital in Wuhan, China. The investigators plan to recruit 80 patients with COVID-19 and 80 matched healthy control. Using the design of case-control study, the study aims to assess the neurocognitive functions such as executive function and attentional bias in recovered patients with COVID-19 under normal and stress conditions, and to analyze the influencing factors of neurocognitive functions, such as mental health conditions, inflammation indicators and cardiopulmonary function.

primary_outcome.description: assessed by the n-back task, including 0-back, 1-back and 2-back

secondary_outcome.description: Concentration of serum TNFalpha in ng/ml will be assessed by ELISA
Concentration of serum IL-6 in ng/ml will be assessed by ELISA.
hypersensitive C-reactive protein(hs-CRP) in mg/L will be assessed by Turbidimetric inhibition immuno assay.
assessed by Self-Rating Depression Scale, which is consist of 20 items scoring 1 to 4.
assessed by Self-Rating Anxiety Scale, which is consist of 20 items scoring 1 to 4.
assessed by PTSD Checklist for DSM-5 (PCL-5)
assessed by Pittsburgh sleep quality index (PSQI)
maximal inspiration pressure（MIP), maximal expiration pressure（MEP）

other_outcome.time_frame: Saliva samples will be colleted before stress, 0 minutes and 10 minutes after stress.
other_outcome.description: concentration of saliva cortisol stress, assessed by ELISA

other_outcome.time_frame: Assessed before and 0 minute after stress
Assessed before and 0 minute after stress
other_outcome.description: Blood pressure before stress and after stress

study_pop.textblock: Recovered COVID-19 patients and uninfected residents in Wuhan

overall_official.affiliation: National Institute on Drug Dependence, Peking University
